ISSUE.TITLE: Date field includes time when choosing "date" type.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : 0.10.6 Database used in NC_DB URL : pg Project was created by clicking : New Project Database on which spreadsheet is created : pg OS on which NocoDB is running : Ubuntu 21.04 Database version : 12.7 **Steps To Reproduce** Create a new database field based on "date" which shows an example of "2020-09-09" Enter a new value for yyyy-mm-dd View in table, it will show yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:00.000Z **Expected behavior** If you select the same date type in Airtable, it just shows yyyy-mm-dd without the time stamp stuff. **Screenshots** Airtable: NoCoDB: I don't want timestamps, that's why I chose just the date. I can shrink the field to hide the zeros but it would be better if this didn't show up at all since the example shows no timestamp date.
